name: BSO
comment:
>>38007772

> [[ 57 ]]

Your opponent is quick to draw, and his sword comes within inches of you as you slide to the left and bring your greatsword around with a horizontal sweep. He has to hit the floor completely in order to dodge, and he falls supine, attempting a quick roll to the side.

Damn, you're gonna have to change your style up.

One of Nel's thrown knives catches him in the shoulder, and he yelps, staggering in his motion before you bring the greatsword down in another overhead slash that catches him between the ribs.

Tatsumaki speeds by, nailing the other Nameless with a flying Concussive kick that divorces him from his weapon and sends him rolling ten feet down the alleyway. He gets up, looking confused, before running away, quickly disappearing into the network of warehouse alleys.

Your guy's still reaching for his sword, but it's taking a second. You heft your weapon and slam it down again, dust and blood spraying skyward.

> Ascheritte defeated player. [[ Party: Nel, Tatsumaki, Aelriss, Donnel ]]

The five of you are gathered outside the door.

> Breach and clear!
> Open and see what's underway inside.
> Find another way in.
